com.openkm.module

接口 NotificationModule

  • 所有已知实现类:
    DbNotificationModule, JcrNotificationModule, OKMNotification

    public interface NotificationModule

    • 方法概要

      方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      java.util.Set<java.lang.String> getSubscriptors(java.lang.String token, java.lang.String nodePath)
      Get user subscriptions from am item (document or folder).
      void notify(java.lang.String token, java.lang.String nodePath, java.util.List<java.lang.String> users, java.lang.String message, boolean attachment)
      Send a notification message to an user list.
      void subscribe(java.lang.String token, java.lang.String nodePath)
      Add user subscription to a node.
      void unsubscribe(java.lang.String token, java.lang.String nodePath)
      Remove an user subscription from a node.

    • 方法详细资料

      • subscribe

        void subscribe(java.lang.String token,
             java.lang.String nodePath)
               throws PathNotFoundException,
                      AccessDeniedException,
                      RepositoryException,
                      DatabaseException
        Add user subscription to a node.
        参数:
        nodePath - The complete path to the node.
        抛出:
        PathNotFoundException - If the node defined by nodePath do not exists.
        AccessDeniedException - If the token authorization information is not valid.
        RepositoryException - If there is any error accessing to the repository.
        DatabaseException

      • unsubscribe

        void unsubscribe(java.lang.String token,
               java.lang.String nodePath)
                 throws PathNotFoundException,
                        AccessDeniedException,
                        RepositoryException,
                        DatabaseException
        Remove an user subscription from a node.
        参数:
        nodePath - The complete path to the node.
        抛出:
        PathNotFoundException - If the node defined by nodePath do not exists.
        AccessDeniedException - If the token authorization information is not valid.
        RepositoryException - If there is any error accessing to the repository.
        DatabaseException

      • getSubscriptors

        java.util.Set<java.lang.String> getSubscriptors(java.lang.String token,
                                              java.lang.String nodePath)
                                                throws PathNotFoundException,
                                                       AccessDeniedException,
                                                       RepositoryException,
                                                       DatabaseException
        Get user subscriptions from am item (document or folder).
        参数:
        nodePath - The complete path to the node.
        返回:
        A Collection of subscribed users.
        抛出:
        PathNotFoundException - If the node defined by nodePath do not exists.
        AccessDeniedException - If the token authorization information is not valid.
        RepositoryException - If there is any error accessing to the repository.
        DatabaseException

      • notify

        void notify(java.lang.String token,
          java.lang.String nodePath,
          java.util.List<java.lang.String> users,
          java.lang.String message,
          boolean attachment)
            throws PathNotFoundException,
                   AccessDeniedException,
                   PrincipalAdapterException,
                   RepositoryException,
                   DatabaseException,
                   java.io.IOException
        Send a notification message to an user list.
        参数:
        nodePath - The complete path to the node.
        users - Array of users to notify.
        message - An String with the notification message.
        抛出:
        PathNotFoundException - If the node defined by nodePath do not exists.
        AccessDeniedException - If the token authorization information is not valid.
        RepositoryException - If there is any error accessing to the repository.
        PrincipalAdapterException
        DatabaseException
        java.io.IOException
